title: How to Clean a Cooktop
summary: Cooktops, or stove tops, may be one of the most-used appliances in your home. Oftentimes when you cook a meal, the surface of your stove gets splattered with residue. As this hot spatter cools, it can create a mess that's difficult to remove. Harsh abrasives and cleaners may remove the stains but may ultimately damage the appliance with scratches, discoloration, or even chemical erosion. By learning how to clean a cooktop the correct way, you can easily remove any kind of mess and preserve the surface of your stove for years to come.
actions: {"1": "Remove all dirty dishes and any leftover food from the cooktop surface.", "2": "Wash down the entire surface area of your cooktop after it cools.", "3": "Apply a non-abrasive stove top cleaner to the surface of the stove.", "4": "Rinse the cooktop surface thoroughly with clean water after cleaning."}
things_needed: Hot water,Non-abrasive stove top cleaner,Liquid dishwashing detergent (optional),Soft sponge,Old toothbrush,Razor blade,Hot pad holder,Baking soda (optional)

things_needed: two shotguns or some other high powered gun preferably a buffalo rifle,a stallion horse or some other fast horse or even a donkey or a bull,a train track bridge with no railing,long line of players make sure there even, example 5 people on one side 5 on the other so every one will charge the same person

title: How to Make a Power Outage Kit
summary: Remember back in August 2003, when most of New England and Ontario were left in the dark during a blackout? Even if you weren't affected then, you have no doubt experienced a power outage in your life. And it can be quite frustrating and potentially dangerous. With a power outage kit, you'll be able to get through all those pesky blackouts and brownouts no problem!
actions: {"1": "######Gather all the items listed in the "Things You'll Need" section near the bottom of this page.", "2": "######Put it all together in some sort of container.", "3": "######Make sure it is easy to open, since you'll probably have to fumble for it in the dark.", "4": "######Put it in a convenient spot."}
things_needed: At least 10 chemical light sticks. These provide a decent amount of light for 8+ hours (depending on the type you buy). Remember, using them in hot weather will produce a brighter glow for a shorter period of time, and cold weather does the opposite.,2 or more flashlights with batteries. Any kind will do, and it's a good idea to throw in some extra batteries with it. Put one battery in backwards so they won't all die on you.,Water purification tablets. Water treatment plants use hydro too, so your water out of your tap will be untreated. Don't get the emergency kind, as those aren't meant to be used continuously (they contain lots of iodine). Fifty tablets should be plenty.,A corded, non-electrical telephone. These are available for around $10 at general merchandise stores like Walmart. They only have a phone cable, no hydro required. You could try garage sales or dig out grandma's old rotary phone, as long as they work. Remember, a rotary phone won't work for touch-tone phone services (like extensions, entering information, et al.).,A wind-up radio. This is to keep you informed as to why you have no power. Most models have a flashlight, and some have solar panels and even a cell phone charger. You could also buy one with a weather radio in it.,A small one-burner camp stove. Try to get the kind that uses Sterno-style fuel, since they are easy to light and easy to use. Also include enough fuel to last several days. ,Do not use this for heat,, as stoves give off carbon monoxide. If you already have a gas stove at home, you can skip this item.,Matches or a butane lighter. That stove won't light itself (unless it has an ignition button), so keep a few boxes. Butane won't work below freezing, so keep matches just in case.,Small fire extinguisher. During a power outage, you will be using open flames more often that normal. You don't want your house burning down.,Windup alarm clock. Remember these? They're handy to have if you still have to go to work in the morning.,If you have an electric can opener, throw in a manual one.

title: How to Fold Bath Towels for Quick Hanging at Home

actions: {"1": "Fold the towel in thirds lengthwise.", "2": "Fold in half, and then in half again.", "3": "Store the towel in the linen closet.", "4": "To go from the closet for hanging, simply unfold the final fold and hang on the towel rack."}

title: How to Kill Flood on Halo 1 and 3

actions: {"1": "On Halo 1, a shotgun will take care of Combat Forms in the most expedient way possible (excepting a rocket launcher or any type of explosive).", "2": "On Halo 3, there are Flood Pure Forms, which are a lot harder to kill.", "3": "For Halo 3 The Flood can be generally be easily killed on any difficulty, the only time they put up a decent fight is when you are playing on Heroic difficulty, and they can be an actual challenge when you play on Legendary difficulty.", "4": "When you encounter a Tank Flood Form,UNSC weapons are weak against these huge things!If you find an Energy Sword or rocket launcher,and fuel rod cannon kill them quickly they can also pack a punch!"}

title: How to Make Shirkhurma
summary: Here are some tips to make tasty Indian style Sheer Khurma.
actions: {"1": "Heat the saffron in a small metal bowl,on a very low a flame,shaking the bowl all the time so that saffron threads do not turn.", "2": "When cooled,crush it with finger tips and keep aside.Heat ghee in a heavy bottomed pan,lower the flame,put in the vermicelli and fry till it turns into a light golden color.Pour 1/2 cup water.In a few minutes the vermicelli would be soft.", "3": "Pour milk and cook it for 8 minutes.Add sugar and simmer for another few minutes.Cut blanched almonds and pistachios finely.Add half of these with charoli,cardamom powder,raisins,crushed saffron and rose essence.Either rose essence or saffron should be used to keep the flavor pure.", "4": "Pour this ready Shirkhurma in a big glass bowl and garnish with remaining pieces of almond and pistachios."}
things_needed: 120 gm vermicelli,4 cup milk,1/4 tsp saffron,5 tsp sugar or more if required,1/2 tsp cardamom powder,1/2 tsp charleroi wiped with cloth,10 almonds blanched,15 pistachios blanched,2 tsp raisins,8 to 10 drops rose essence,1.25 tbsp pure ghee
